title: Border, 1820–25
creditline: Museum purchase through gift of Catharine Oglesby
description: Three borders printed side by side on the length of paper. A frieze of roses and other flowers, printed in red, yellow, blue and green on a white ground. Above, a border of rope with one blue and four yellow strands.

tombstone.epitaph:
Border, 1820–25.
1820–25. Block-printed on handmade paper. Museum purchase through gift of Catharine Oglesby. 1958-78-3.
